title: EVM Malfunction Video From UP Falsely Shared As Chhattisgarh’s
subtitle: A video posted to Facebook purporting to show electronic voting machines (EVMs) were hacked and registering votes only for BJP candidates in Chhattisgarh, is false.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
CLAIM: This is a video from Chhattisgarh showing Electronic Voting Machines (EVM) malfunctioning and registering votes for Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) candidates irrespective of the buttons being pressed.

FACT: The video is from Meerut, Uttar Pradesh and not Chhattisgarh. It was shot in November 2017 during civic polls in UP.
